title: National Blueberry Festival App
tagline: How can we program and design an app to inform participants of a festival about upcoming events?

specs.overview: The National Blueberry Festival takes place every second weekend in August in South Haven, Michigan. My brother and I were approached by the festival planning committee to create an app to replace paper schedules that would include live updates and the ability to reuse it each year. He would focus on back-end development and I would design the interface and write front-end code in React Native for the app.
